original_text: And the priest shall burn the memorial of it, part of the beaten corn thereof, and part of the oil thereof, with all the frankincense thereof: it is an offering made by fire unto the Lord.
korean_text: 제사장은 찧은 곡식과 기름을 모든 유향과 함께 기념물로 불사를지니 이는 여호와께 드리는 화제니라

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall burn the memorial of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그것의 기념물을 불사를 것이라

sentences.original_text: part of the beaten corn thereof
and part of the oil thereof
it is an offering made by fire
